      • getWeight

        public final int getWeight(VertexInterface src,
            VertexInterface dst)
        Description copied from interface: GraphInterface
        get the weight of a border in graph
        Specified by:
        getWeight in interface GraphInterface
        Parameters:
        src - The box where starts the arch
        dst - The box where arrives the arch
        Returns:
        Returns the weight of the arch linking src and dst (in this case every existing arch has a weight of 1)

        public final boolean ifContainsStartVertex()
        Returns:
